shift­Dense­Vector

Copyright (C) 2005 IENT-RWTH Aachen

template<class V,class A=alignment_allocator<V> > struct shiftDenseVector

Shifted dense vector type

Generic Parameters

V

Type of the elements
A

Optional allocator

Example

shiftDenseVector<int>::self X(4, "1 2 3 4", -2); // validity domain of indexes: -2..1
DenseVector<int>::self Y(4,"1 2 3 4");
shiftDenseVector<int>::self Z = shift(X,-2) // shift and copy, validity domain of Y indexes: -2..1

See Also

DenseVector, shiftDenseMatrix, shiftTinyVector, shift
